sql.if: and cusnm like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or caddr like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.insert: insert into scribetb(authorid, scribeid, usetype, adate) values(#{authorid}, #{scribeid}, 'p', now())
mapper.delete: delete from scribetb where authorid = #{authorid} and scribeid = #{scribeid}
mapper.select: select authorid, scribeid from scribetb where authorid = #{puserid} and scribeid = #{writer} and usetype = 'p'

select rn, authorid, scribeid, cusnm, caddr, adate from ( select a.authorid, a.scribeid, b.cusnm, b.caddr, a.adate, row_number() over(order by adate desc) as rn from scribetb a inner join cusertb b on (a.scribeid = b.cuserid) ) as a where authorid = #{authorid}
order by rn asc

select count(*) from ( select a.authorid, a.scribeid, b.cusnm, b.caddr, a.adate, row_number() over(order by adate desc) as rn from scribetb a inner join cusertb b on (a.scribeid = b.cuserid) ) as a where authorid = #{authorid}
